domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump If you washed your hands of leading the battle against coronavirus, can’t you, at a minimum, support the states with supplies and money to get the job done? Instead, you opt to make petty insults and also try to incite revolts in some states with irresponsible tweets.
